thread.title: Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4
thread.title_full: Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4

title: Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4
text:
> Sports Dodgers pick Kershaw to start on 3 days' rest in Game 4 Los Angeles Dodgers starting pitcher Clayton Kershaw throws on the field before taking a bullpen session on a NLDS workout day, Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015, at CitiField in New York. (AP Photo/Kathy Willens)
